nodes.text: The Museum of Alien History was a museum located in Axial Park, a district of Coronet City, the capital of the planet Corellia. In 3640 BBY, during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, the Imperial forces have occupied the museum and used as a makeshift camp for POWs. After high-profile Republic Senator Bevera Dodonna was revealed as a traitor and fled to the museum, Jedi Master Sumalee authorized a mission to locate and retrieve her. Selonian Curske provided the maps of Selonian tunnels leading to the museum and the smuggler Voidhound went in and apprehended the traitorous Senator.
